data.name: GRAB
data.detailed_description:
GRAB is a VR multiplayer parkour game. Climb, jump, slide and swing through the levels to reach the end, but don't fall or touch the lava!
A core component of GRAB is the level editor that lets you and your friends create your own levels together and upload them for everyone else to play.

Features:

  • active and fun physics based controls
  • Play with up to 16 players in cross platform multiplayer
  • Built-in tutorial levels to get you started as well as some more advanced bigger levels
  • Built-in level editor that lets you build levels together with your friends in multiplayer with quick switching between testing and editing
  • Download levels made by the community and upload your own
  • Over 60000 levels made by the community!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Core i5-4590 or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
